about_the_game:
Kohara is under siege. The Great Link suddenly opened portals between its nine worlds, allowing Dwellers - unique creatures inhabiting each - to rampage unchecked. Within six months, they pushed humanity to the edge. Worlds teeter on the brink of collapse, as war, famine, and fanaticism spread like wildfire. In the middle of this is Gero, a young student of So-Hamon, who doesn't know that he will play a crucial role in stopping the end times.



Dwellink: War of the Nine is a dark fantasy creature collector RPG. Explore the nine worlds buckling under the assault of the Dwellers, capture and harness their powers, defeat your enemies in deep turn-based combat encounters, and figure out the mystery behind the Great Link before the sun sets on Kohara!




Magical animals, demons and other remnants of Satanic armies, magical experiments, or technology gone awry: Dwellers are arcane creatures of immense power that inhabit each of the Nine Worlds. Set loose on the worlds, each can be yours.

Capture and tame over one hundred distinct creatures, bending them to your will. From classic birds of prey, through demonic servants and twisted centaurs, to archangels and gods, each will serve you in your quest if you’re strong enough.

Assemble a pack of Dwellers worthy of saving the Nine Worlds, training them in combat, unlocking their abilities, and mastering the interplay between their types and alignments.




Explore unique worlds full of challenge and opportunity, expanding as you bond with new Dwellers: Tear through rocks, levitate through air, activate ancient elemental runes, and more. Seek out powerful bosses across the fallen worlds and defeat them to gain their power.

Battle your foes in turn-based encounters. Survival demands cunning and skill, as everything matters: Environment, type, alignment, and even place in the roster. Ambush your foes, choose the battlefield - or risk everything in dangerous gambits!

Strategize your path across Kohara. Opportunities to heal are few, Dwellers plentiful, the risk great. Each battle is an opportunity - but also risks leaving you unprepared for the dangers ahead. Feeling confident? The optional permadeath mode raises the stakes even further.




From the lush forests and idyllic villages of the heartland, through the harsh deserts and ruins of Vinor, to the holy capital in the Skyworld and beyond, each of the Nine Worlds that make up Kohara is unique.

Beyond visuals, each world's struggle is unique. As nations crumble and Dwellers rampage unchecked, the Great Link redraws the balance of power, pushing humanity into either its finest hour or the very last moments.

You will choose which one it'll be, as you experience a complex story exploring the impact of such a cataclysm on humanity. As famine and war spread unchecked, there are no heroes or villains, only people pushed beyond their limits. Who will you be?

content_descriptors.notes: The game features topics such as self-harm, drug abuse, war, subjugation, cultism, blasphemy, sexuality, violence and more.

name: Dwellink: War of the Nine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel-Core i5-10400/i7-6800k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5-10600K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 3060ti/3070
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required

short_description: Dwellink is a dark fantasy creature collector RPG, set in a universe under siege. The Great Link opened portals connecting the Nine Worlds of Kohara, allowing ferocious Dwellers to spread chaos and destruction. It's up to you to discover the source of the cataclysm and end it once and for all!
